title: In case of any residential development partially or fully consisting of sub-division/amalgamation/layout or single plot of land having gross plot area admeasuring 4000 sq
clause_text: In case of any residential development partially or fully consisting of sub-division/amalgamation/layout or single plot of land having gross plot area admeasuring 4000 sq.m. or more (excluding the area under Road set back/DP Road/ existing amenity/reservation) shall have the provision of IH as described below:
